page.title: 12ARTISTIC TALENT:EAST COKER
page.content: In a village of 1738 people an{Art {Gallery}may seem rather surprising. The Alpha Gallery,opened 18 months ago is thriving.It began in a small way with the owner selling her own hand painted furniture and slowly expanded as other artists and craftsmen appeared.Now the gallery sells the work of{artists from Somerset and {Dorset.}Objects include{paintings, {pottery,glassware,carvings,sculpture, {jewellery,smocked and knitted garments all of high quality.Prices range from a few pounds for a silver necklace to several hundred pounds for a bronze. Village people are also active.There is a{sculptor,a musical instrument maker, a maker of{stained glass,}an {embroideress}of high standing,several talented{flower arrangers}and an {active handicraft group}in the Women's Institute.
